feed.title: RomM Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.10.1
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fix ramatcher on multi-file games by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1936
  • Cleanup lingering t_thumb in cover and screenshot art by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1940
  • Update README.md by @Konscription in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1939

New Contributors

  • @Konscription made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1939

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.10.0...3.10.1

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.10.2
entry.content:
Minor changes

  • Add support for doom and acpc in emulatorjs by @gantoine
  • Reinstate click on console icon for platform settings by @gantoine
  • Add RetroAchievements links to game and achievement badges by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1944
  • Display achievements earned in hardcore mode by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1972
  • Store state of last search when navigating between results and games by @gantoine
  • Reset pagination when changing search field value by @gantoine

Fixes

  • Consistent use of click handlers by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1945
  • Add fallback for homepage when library is empty by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1962
  • Fix RA platform IDs for metadata matching by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1973
  • Icons in the action bar should always be white for readability by @gantoine
  • Create the parent folder on game upload when not in the filesystem by @gantoine
  • Corrected IGDB age ratings by @gantoine
  • Set default value of enable3DEffect to false if not specified in localStorage by @zurdi15

Other changes

  • Remove critical log messages for 403 and 404 exceptions by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1942
  • Add typing to RetroAchievements API responses by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1946
  • Create RetroAchievements service adapter by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1951
  • Use aiohttp for RetroAchievements API calls by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1956
  • Move back to upstream streaming-form-data dependency by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1955
  • Iterate through user completion progress in RetroAchievements by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1961
  • Use optional flags instead of booleans for Rom filtering by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1963
  • Upgrade RALibretro to the current upstream version by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1970

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.10.1...3.10.2

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.10.3
entry.content:
CVE-2025-53908

[!CAUTION] This release fixes a critical authenticated path traversal vulnerability in an API endpoint that could allow unauthorized access to system files. All previous versions are affected. All users should update immediately to this patch version. https://github.com/rommapp/romm/security/advisories/GHSA-fx9g-xw4j-jwc3

What's Changed

  • Added proper input validation and sanitization to prevent directory traversal attacks by @gantoine in #2086

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.10.2...3.10.3

entry.title: New release for RomM: v4.0.0: Hashed Edition
entry.content:
It's here, it's real and it's awesome: 4.0.0 is our most feature-packed release yet! ðŸ’«

We're thrilled to finally announce the long-awaited hash-based metadata matching feature, which allows you to validate your ROMs against popular DATfile databases like No-Intro, Redump and TOSEC.

[!CAUTION] This release fixes a critical authenticated arbitrary file write vulnerability (CVE-2025-54071) in all API endpoints that accept uploaded files, which can lead to remote code execution on the system. All previous versions are affected. All users should update immediately to this version, or see the mitigations in the advisory below. #2085 https://github.com/rommapp/romm/security/advisories/GHSA-fgxf-hggc-qqmq

Highlights

Hash-based metadata matching

We've partnered with two friends and members of the community, @michael-j-green and @DevYukine, to bring you a powerful new feature that allows you to match your ROMs against hash databases like No-Intro, Redump and TOSEC. They've built new public and free APIs, Hasheous and Playmatch respectively, that validate the contents of your ROM files against these databases. In the case of Hasheous, it also proxies metadata from IGDB, so you no longer need to set up IGDB credentials to fetch metadata from IGDB.

To start using Hasheous, simply set HASHEOUS_API_ENABLED=true in your environment variables, and future scans will use the Hasheous API. And for Playmatch, set PLAYMATCH_API_ENABLED=true in your environment variables. Note that you'll need to set up IGDB credentials to use Playmatch, as it does not proxy IGDB metadata like Hasheous does.

You can find popular metadata provider combinations for scans in the documentation.

1931 #1990 #1997

LaunchBox metadata

The LaunchBox Games Database is a community-driven database that provides metadata, cover art, and screenshots. Like the LaunchBox desktop application, RomM downloads the entire database locally and matches games based on their exact filenames. This is a privacy-friendly option for users who want to import metadata without relying on online APIs, and/or already use LaunchBox to manage their game collections.

To enable LaunchBox, set LAUNCHBOX_API_ENABLED=true in your environment variables. You can enable regular updates of the database by setting ENABLE_SCHEDULED_UPDATE_LAUNCHBOX_METADATA, and set the frequency of the cron job with SCHEDULED_UPDATE_LAUNCHBOX_METADATA_CRON (defaults to 5:00 AM every day).

1515

SteamGridDB during scans

SteamGridDB, the community-driven platform for cover art, is now available to use during scans. When selected as a source on the scan page, RomM will prioritize high-quality cover art from SteamGridDB for both matched and unmatched (no metadata found) games. Instructions for setting up SteamGridDB are available in the documentation.

Mark games with missing files as "missing"

In previous versions, RomM would delete games from the database if the file(s) were missing from the filesystem. This would lead to the loss of notes, save files and manual metadata matches. Now, these games will be marked as "missing" instead of being deleted, allowing you to restore them later if the files are added back. Use the filter bar on the search, platform and collection pages to easily find these games.

1977

Android app

Community member and developer extraordinaire @mattsays has just released an unofficial companion app for RomM. The app allows you to browse, manage, and organize your retro gaming collection directly from your Android device, as well as download games to it. While the app is not yet available on the Google Play Store, you can download the latest APK from the GitHub repository.

DOS with EmulatorJS

Playing MS-DOS games in the browser is now possible with EmulatorJS, with a bit of setup required. As with PSP emulation, we recommend using the unofficial desktop app, which enables the required browser features without compromising your security.

Minor changes

  • Add custom session max age with SESSION_MAX_AGE_SECONDS by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1982
  • Add stats summary back to the homepage as a display option by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1983
  • Calculate hashes before fetching metadata by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1981
  • Add TheGamesDB handler for platforms by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1994
  • Use URL to store and load search params by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2045
  • Add provider icons to scan page on match by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2084
  • Random game button by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2091
  • Add and update platform icons by @milktoastrat in #2000, #1980, #2007, #2021 and #2092

Fixes

  • Added form rules that only allow ASCII chars on create user form by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1991
  • Fix Retroachievements URL in README by @Azelphur in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1998
  • Random fixes and improvements by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1999
  • Use request body for user creation and update endpoints by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2012
  • Specify English language for all Markdown blocks by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2029
  • Add debounce to RomUser changes by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2028
  • Set the correct forward proto when behind ssl proxy by @starkmapper in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2043
  • Require threads for dosbox_pure core by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2054
  • Only use first file in compressed game when calculating hashes by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2073
  • Stop overwriting IDs on partial metadata scans by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2077
  • Improve fuzzy matching in SGDBBaseHandler for game search by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2079
  • Update roms_metadata virtual table by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2083
  • SGDB cover fallback by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2087
  • Load platform icon image source to prefer SVG over ICO format by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2089

Other changes

[!WARNING] API endpoint changes * Remove deprecated boolean parameters from get_roms endpoint by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2004 * Remove support for deprecated GUNICORN_WORKERS variable by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2003 * Provide Dockerfile for devs by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1960 * Remove _request method from RAHandler by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2005 * Update DEVELOPER_SETUP.md by @Konscription in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2016 * Remove unused methods from roms_handler by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2017 * Create ScreenScraper service adapter by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2002 * Create SteamGridDB service adapter by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2018 * Create MobyGames service adapter by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2023 * Improve API docs and annotations for rom endpoints by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2033 * Apply pyupgrade changes for Python 3.12 compatibility by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2034 * Improve API docs and annotations for platform endpoints by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2036 * Switch from poetry to uv by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2049 * Remove Python dependencies not being directly used by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2051 * Replace deprecated uvicorn.workers with uvicorn-worker by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2053 * Add code coverage for backend tests by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2056 * Correctly use Python 3.13 in Docker image by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2059 * Only subscribe to relevant filesystem events with watchdog by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2060 * Upgrade to Python 3.13 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2048 * Upgrade nginx to v1.29.0 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2035 * Upgrade py7zr to v1.0.0 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2068 * Upgrade RALibretro to v1.8.1 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2027 * Upgrade FastAPI to v0.116 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2069 * Bump @intlify/core-base and vue-i18n in /frontend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2088

New Contributors

  • @milktoastrat made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1980
  • @DevYukine made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1931
  • @Azelphur made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1998
  • @starkmapper made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2043

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.10.3...4.0.0

entry.title: New release for RomM: v4.0.1
entry.content:
Minor changes

  • Added clean resources task + revamped the whole task system by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2135
  • [ROMM-2118] Store last scan selected sources in storage by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2120
  • [ROMM-1975] Add YOUTUBE_BASE_URL for custom youtube proxy by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2125
  • [ROMM-1230] Add background color picker to ruffle by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2129
  • Display version information in the banner by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2117

Fixes

  • Fixed horizontal scrollable layout in details view by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2116
  • Use validate_path for getting rom_files by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2106
  • [ROMM-2109] Fix clicking on meta pills, use correct filters by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2121
  • [ROMM-2107] Fix launchbox URL by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2122
  • [ROMM-2114] Fix using symlinks on volumes by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2123
  • [ROMM-2127] Add missing ssfr platform and fix IDs by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2152

Other changes

  • Update logos by @milktoastrat in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2138
  • Add new icon for platform ports by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2115
  • Fix spelling error ('arwork' to 'artwork') in README by @dyingpotato890 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2112
  • Enhance grammar and consistency in README by @Gayathri-K-Binoy in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2113
  • Group generated platforms by slug and filter by name by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2124
  • Bump form-data from 4.0.1 to 4.0.4 in /frontend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2133
  • Service adapter tests by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2058, https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2139

New Contributors

  • @dyingpotato890 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2112
  • @Gayathri-K-Binoy made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/2113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/4.0.0...4.0.1
